text: is a Japanese slalom canoeist who has competed since 2006. She finished in 20th place in the K1 event at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro. Her brother Kazuki Yazawa is also an Olympic slalom canoeist. ==World Cup individual podiums== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font- size:95%;" !Season !Date !Venue !Position !Event |- | 2010 || align=right| 2 May 2010 ||align=left| Xiasi || bgcolor=cc9966|3rd || K11 |} : 1 Asian Canoe Slalom Championship counting for World Cup points ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese female canoeists Category:Olympic canoeists of Japan Category:Canoeists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games medalists in canoeing Category:Canoeists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Canoeists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:People from Iida, Nagano
title: Aki Yazawa
